name: eslint-plugin-react
description: React specific linting rules for ESLint

scripts.unit-test: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha tests/lib/**/*.js tests/util/**/*.js tests/index.js
scripts.generate-list-of-rules:check: npm run generate-list-of-rules && git diff --exit-code README.md
